I'm always looking for ways to incorporate my love of Christmas into my life, even when I'm busy with school and work.
i volunteer at the red cross on the weekends.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
My phone will be out and ready to capture the best moments at the festival this weekend!
I am a Canadian who loves basketball, vintage clothing and my home.
I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee.
i own a mansion that i do not live in.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello!
How are you today?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm excited to be talking to you today.
Me too! I'm always happy to make new friends.
That's great to hear. I'm sure we'll get along great.
I'm sure we will too. So, tell me a little bit about yourself.

Well, I have four daughters who are my pride and joy. I'm always looking for ways to incorporate my love of Christmas into my life, even when I'm busy with school and work. I volunteer at the Red Cross on the weekends and I love spending lots of time playing and laughing with my kids.
That sounds like you have a very busy, but happy life.
It is! I love my life and I'm grateful for every moment.
That's great to hear. I'm glad you're happy.
Thank you. What about you? Tell me a little bit about yourself.
I'm a Canadian who loves basketball, vintage clothing and my home. I also like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee.
That sounds like a great way to start the day. I love the smell of fresh-brewed coffee too.
It's the best! So, what do you do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family and friends, read, and go to concerts.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love going to concerts too.
Me too! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm especially into country music.
That's great! I love country music too.
It's so much fun to dance to.
I know right! It's the best.
I'm glad you like country music too. We should go to a concert together sometime.
That would be fun
